string.name: menu_filter_by_grow_zone
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed schools by grow zone.

string.name: my_schools_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My Schools' screen where the user can see the list of schools that have been added to their school.

string.name: school_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the school list screen where the user can see a list of schools available to add to their school.

string.name: available
string.translation_description: Text for the header of the school list page indicating the available schools for users to choose from.

string.name: school_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the school details screen where the user can see the details for a specific school.

string.name: add_school
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the school List to add schools to their empty school.

string.name: added_school_to_my_schools
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a school to their empty school.

string.name: school_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My school' screen when no schools have been added to the user's school

string.name: menu_item_share_school
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: share_text_school
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a school on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s school in the Android CNH app

string.name: mock_school_overview_paragraph
string.translation_description: Mock text for an overview paragraph of a school

resources.string: Students who are prepared for college must have an education that encourages them to take risks as they produce and perform. Our college preparatory curriculum develops writers and has built a tight-knit community. Our school develops students who can think analytically and write creatively. Our arts programming builds on our 25 years of experience in visual, performing arts and music on a middle school level. We partner with New Audience and the Whitney Museum as cultural partners. We are a International Baccalaureate (IB) candidate school that offers opportunities to take college courses at neighboring universities.

string.name: mock_academic_opportunities1
string.translation_description: Mock text for academic opportunities1

resources.string: Free college courses at neighboring universities

string.name: mock_academic_opportunities2
string.translation_description: Mock text for academic opportunities2

resources.string: International Travel, Special Arts Programs, Music, Internships, College Mentoring English Language Learner Programs: English as a New Language

string.name: mock_academic_opportunities3
string.translation_description: Mock text for academic opportunities3

resources.string: The Learning to Work (LTW) partner for Liberation Diploma Plus High School is CAMBA.

string.name: mock_academic_opportunities4
string.translation_description: Mock text for academic opportunities4

resources.string: PEARLS Awards, Academy Awards, Rose Ceremony/Parent Daughter Breakfast, Ice Cream Social.

string.name: mock_academic_opportunities5
string.translation_description: Mock text for academic opportunities5

string.name: servicing_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a school should be serviced. Used in combination with servicing_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often a school should be serviced, singular. Used in combination with servicing_needs_prefix: 'Servicing needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a school should be serviced, plural. Used in combination with servicing_needs_prefix: 'Servicing needs: every 8 days'.
Text indicating when the the school should next be serviced, singular. Used in conjunction with last serviced date. 'May 24, 2020 - service tomorrow.'.
Text indicating when the the school should next be serviced, plural. Used in conjunction with last serviced date. 'May 24, 2020 - service in 8 days.'.

string.name: a11y_school_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the school images shown in the 'My schools' and 'Schools list' screens.

string.name: gallery_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the gallery screen

string.name: school_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the school detail screen.
